title: We're Live... EVERYWHERE!!!
itunes:title: We're Live... EVERYWHERE!!!
description:
Join us for our first exclusive live broadcast across the Cigar Authority Radio network! This week we welcome in Max Bickler, the New England representative of Rocky Patel, where we light up and discuss the all new Rocky Patel 15th Anniversary cigar. We also pay tribute to the legend, Mitch Miller, talk about a teacher making headlines for "smoking in the boys room," and our old producer, Mr. Jonathon, comes by for a visit.

Uncork the wine, light up your favorite stogie and sit back and enjoy the show!
